name: ListHiringTeamRoles
description:
Retrieve possible hiring team roles within an organization.

Call this tool to get a list of hiring team roles for an organization. Useful for understanding the roles involved in hiring processes. Ensure you have the 'organizationRead' permission to use this tool.

parameters.name: return_role_titles_only
parameters.description: Set to true to return only role titles. Set to false to return objects with id and title.

value_schema.description: When set to true (the default), an array of role titles is returned. When set to false, an array of objects that include the id and title of the role is returned.
